content: उपरिष्टात् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} [<ab>cf.</ab> <ls>P. V. 3. 31</ls>] {@--1@} As an adverb it means ({%a%}) Over, above, from above, on high; परहितकरणे नोपरिष्टान्न चाधः <ls>Bh. 3. 131</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 106.</ls> ({%b%}) Further or later on, afterwards; कल्याणावतंसा हि कल्याण संपदुपरिष्टाद्भवति <ls>Māl. 6</ls>; इदमुपरिष्टात् व्याख्यातं in the sequel. ({%c%}) Behind (<ab>opp.</ab> पुरस्तात्). {@--2@} (As a preposition) it means ({%a%}) Over, upon (with <ab>gen.</ab>, rarely <ab>acc.</ab>); <ls>Śi. 11. 3.</ls> ({%b%}) Down upon. ({%c%}) Behind (with <ab>gen.</ab>).
